entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 1:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -44.0°C
Wind: NNW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 37. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
